title: Video: Club Smith – ‘No Friend of Mine’
content:
Club Smith have released the video to their debut single ‘No Friend of Mine‘, and it’s no ordinary performance video.

Directed, produced and edited by Danny North and Tim Blackwell, the video sees lead singer Sam Robson in a bloody boxing match, from the point of view of his opponent. Entertaining and absorbing, the video captures the attitude and energy present in the track itself. Enjoy!

‘No Friend of Mine‘ is released on Front Wall Records on the 6th June.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d0e
